nodes.text: The Second Mission to Tatooine was a mission completed by clone trooper Denal. After his most recent mission, Denal was sent to investigate a small droid encampment in the desert. Denal proceed with the mission. Everything seemed quiet, until Denal received a message from Obi-Wan Kenobi, who informed him that Anakin Skywalker's Padawan, Ahsoka Tano had been captured and been held in the Separatist prison. Denal infiltrated the enemy base, where he found a Jedi, who joined Denal in this mission. Eventually, the mission was completed and Tano was freed.
The next assignment given to Denal was to destroy a Separatist construction yard. It was needed to weaken the defenses of the main Separatist HQ, that was the site of the work on a secret project.
